item.description:
WHEW! Some meeting we had last month! Over 130 attended. Good going with plenty of help from everyone. Thanks to our great group!

ANOTHER great night is in store for us this May.

"Captain Keith McKinley. Learned to fly at Sterling airport while in college. BS in
Chemistry.
Flew 8 years in the USMC, was a flight instructor, Weapons school
graduate, LSO. flew the t-28, t-2c, ta-4, av8a, av8b. Has about a
100 shipboard landings.
Flew a couple years in the MA ANG in Westfield A-10's
He has 20 years with Delta . Currently a 767er International Capt. Flown the 727, 757, 757er, 767, 767er, L-1011
Typed in the 75/767 have an ATP and around 13,000 hours. 2000
hours in fighters
Currently fly with the Northeast Raiders Demo team in a Nanchang
CJ-6a."

I tried to find someone with more qualifications, but Buzz Aldrin was busy that night!

We'll also be discussing the possible Wings and Wheels show for the fall. Young Eagles and more...


As always, food at 6:00 and meeting at 7:00.

We're also working on having worldwide reknown aerobatic performer Mike Goulian speak at one of our meetings before the summer.... Where else can you have this much excitement for $25 bucks a year?

See you all soon.
Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association EAA Chapter 1454 May Meetup
